card.name: Abu Ja'far
card.property: When this creature dies, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by it. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Army of Allah
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Camel
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) As long as this creature is attacking, prevent all damage Deserts would deal to this creature and to creatures banded with this creature.

card.name: Eye for an Eye
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

card.name: Jihad
card.property: As this enchantment enters, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +2/+1 as long as the chosen player controls a nontoken permanent of the chosen color. When the chosen player controls no nontoken permanents of the chosen color, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: King Suleiman
card.property: {T}: Destroy target Djinn or Efreet.

card.name: Moorish Cavalry
card.property: Trample

card.name: Piety
card.property: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Repentant Blacksmith
card.property: Protection from red

card.name: Shahrazad
card.property: Players play a Magic subgame, using their libraries as their decks. Each player who doesn't win the subgame loses half their life, rounded up.

card.name: War Elephant
card.property: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Dandân
card.property: This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Fishliver Oil
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has islandwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Flying Men
card.property: Flying

card.name: Giant Tortoise
card.property: This creature gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

card.name: Island Fish Jasconius
card.property: This creature doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap this creature. This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Merchant Ship
card.property: This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, you gain 2 life. When you control no Islands, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Old Man of the Sea
card.property: You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to this creature's power for as long as this creature remains tapped and that creature's power remains less than or equal to this creature's power.

card.name: Serendib Djinn
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a land. If you sacrifice an Island this way, this creature deals 3 damage to you. When you control no lands, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Serendib Efreet
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sindbad
card.property: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

card.name: Unstable Mutation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Cuombajj Witches
card.property: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

card.name: El-Hajjâj
card.property: Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Erg Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if this creature didn't attack this turn, it deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

card.name: Guardian Beast
card.property: As long as this creature is untapped, noncreature artifacts you control can't be enchanted, they have indestructible, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove Auras already attached to those artifacts.

card.name: Hasran Ogress
card.property: Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

card.name: Junún Efreet
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {B}{B}.

card.name: Juzám Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Khabál Ghoul
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: Oubliette
card.property: When this enchantment enters, target creature phases out until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. Tap that creature as it phases in this way. (Auras and Equipment phase out with it. While permanents are phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist.)

card.name: Sorceress Queen
card.property: {T}: Target creature other than this creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

card.name: Stone-Throwing Devils
card.property: First strike

card.name: Aladdin
Ali Baba
card.property: {R}: Tap target Wall.

card.name: Ali from Cairo
card.property: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Bird Maiden
card.property: Flying

card.name: Desert Nomads
card.property: Desertwalk Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this creature by Deserts.

card.name: Hurr Jackal
card.property: {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.property: This creature gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Magnetic Mountain
card.property: Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures they control and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Mijae Djinn
card.property: Whenever this creature attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove this creature from combat and tap it.

card.name: Rukh Egg
card.property: When this creature dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Ydwen Efreet
card.property: Whenever this creature blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove this creature from combat and it can't block this turn. Creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only this creature this combat become unblocked.

card.name: Cyclone
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on this enchantment, then sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {G} for each wind counter on it. If you pay, this enchantment deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Desert Twister
card.property: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Drop of Honey
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the creature with the least power. It can't be regenerated. If two or more creatures are tied for least power, you choose one of them. When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Ghazbán Ogre
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of this creature.

card.name: Ifh-Bíff Efreet
card.property: Flying {G}: This creature deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Metamorphosis
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.name: Nafs Asp
card.property: Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player loses 1 life at the beginning of their next draw step unless they pay {1} before that draw step.

card.name: Sandstorm
card.property: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Singing Tree
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature has base power 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wyluli Wolf
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Aladdin's Lamp
card.property: {X}, {T}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your library, put all but one of them on the bottom of your library in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

card.name: Aladdin's Ring
card.property: {8}, {T}: This artifact deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Bottle of Suleiman
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, this artifact deals 5 damage to you.

card.name: Brass Man
card.property: This creature doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap this creature.

card.name: City in a Bottle
card.property: Whenever one or more other nontoken permanents with a name originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion are on the battlefield, their controllers sacrifice them. Players can't cast spells or play lands with a name originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion.

card.name: Dancing Scimitar
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Ebony Horse
card.property: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Flying Carpet
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Jandor's Ring
card.property: {2}, {T}, Discard the last card you drew this turn: Draw a card.

card.name: Jandor's Saddlebags
card.property: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.

card.name: Jeweled Bird
card.property: Remove this card from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}: Ante this artifact. If you do, put all other cards you own from the ante into your graveyard, then draw a card.

card.name: Pyramids
card.property: {2}: Choose one — • Destroy target Aura attached to a land. • The next time target land would be destroyed this turn, remove all damage marked on it instead.

card.name: Ring of Ma'rûf
card.property: {5}, {T}, Exile this artifact: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead put a card you own from outside the game into your hand.

card.name: Sandals of Abdallah
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, destroy this artifact. (A creature with islandwalk can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Bazaar of Baghdad
card.property: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

card.name: City of Brass
card.property: Whenever this land becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Desert
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: This land deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

card.name: Diamond Valley
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Elephant Graveyard
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Regenerate target Elephant.

card.name: Island of Wak-Wak
card.property: {T}: Target creature with flying has base power 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Library of Alexandria
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

card.name: Oasis
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
